name: @wavenation/cms
description: WaveNation CMS powered by Payload 3 and Next.js

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --max-old-space-size=8000" pnpm exec next build
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation pnpm exec next dev
scripts.devsafe: rm -rf .next && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation pnpm exec next dev
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation pnpm exec next start
scripts.lint: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation pnpm exec next lint
scripts.test: pnpm run test:int && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test
